summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CRM application with all backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly

fixed_issues.issue: Authentication cookie secure setting preventing login in development
fixed_issues.fix: Modified login route to set secure: false in development environment
fixed_issues.impact: Authentication now works correctly in localhost testing

fixed_issues.issue: Registration not automatically logging user in, causing redirect loop
fixed_issues.impact: Users now seamlessly access dashboard after registration

passed_tests: Lead CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
My Customers page - form submission and list display
Sales Booster page - lead management functionality
Reports page - data visualization and statistics
Complete end-to-end user journey from registration to dashboard usage
